Trade/Device Name(s): Stratus® CS Acute CareTM MB isoenzyme of creatine kinase (CKMB) TestPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM CKMB CalPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM CKMB DilPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM Troponin I (cTnI) TestPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM cTnI CalPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM cTnI DilPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM Myoglobin (MYO) TestPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM MYO CalPak
Stratus® CS Acute CareTM MYO DilPak
Regulation Name(s): Creatine phosphokinase/creatine kinase or isoenzymes test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Stratus CS Acute Care CKMB, cTnI, and Myoglobin test kits, calibrators, and diluents for in vitro diagnostic testing of cardiac markers using immunoassay methodology
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic assays for measurement of CKMB, cardiac troponin I, and myoglobin in heparinized plasma as aids in the diagnosis of myocardial infarction and risk stratification of acute coronary syndromes, for use by trained health care professionals in clinical laboratory and point-of-care settings
